column4: hey I'm not sure exactly what happened but i can't login to gnome right now .. anyone have this issue installing 6.10?
avangant..hey hey ..yeah so everything installed but gnome seems to be crippled
yeah I'm stuck in failsaif terminal -VNC's to another machine so i canbrowse at least
well thats where I'm stuck now.. everything installed.. but it looks like 6.10 hate me
all i have is a terminal window
If you would explain your problem perhaps we could help you.
well pick the non recovermode from the grub list.  Then log in to gnome.
well both the install disk and my now broken upgrade to 6.10 from 6.06 seems to constantly be restarting my X session after I log in..
tried loads up to a point then i end up back at my login screen
well what type of video card?
also have you checked /var/log/Xorg.0.old for error messages
okay are you able to start the system in recover mode and log in so you atleast have a text terminal?
okay well first lets sudo nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf   and check out the Driver section
.. just got K we'll see what happens
